articles.title: Trump Returns to Pennsylvania Rally Amid Election Chaos
articles.description: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump revisited a Pennsylvania rally site where he was nearly assassinated. The U.S. port strike has ended with significant economic repercussions.
articles.content:
Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump returned to rural Pennsylvania this Saturday, revisiting the site of an assassination attempt last July, and rallying a substantial crowd in this pivotal state just a month before the upcoming election.

articles.title: Can we trust the polls for the US election?
articles.description: The 2020 US presidential election saw the biggest polling miss in 40 years. We ask how much can we trust current figures suggesting Kamala Harris and Donald Trump are in the tightest race for decades? And we give you a steer on how to read individual, tracker and state polls.
articles.content:
Ask most party strategists, US pollsters or pundits and they'll tell you the 2024 presidential election could be the closest in decades, if not a century.
